review_body: The free tour given by Pineapple Your was a fantastic way to meet other hostel stayers and a fabulous way to see some gorgeous sights and learn a bit about the island's history. Layed back hospitality. Perfect for a new arrival.

Perfect place, very close to the beach! I extended my stay twice Nice people, very helpful. Free breakfast each morning between 9 to 10 am.Free tour on Wednesday,wonderful (10 to 15h30), guided by a super guide Ryan and his very friendly doggy Yoda !Loved it ! :) Will recommend +++

Signed up for the free Wednesday tour of the East Side of Maui through the Waikiki Beachside Hostel, figured there was nothing to lose! Ended up having an incredible time, learning a lot about the local culture and some historic landmarks. What a wonderful perk of staying at the hostel to get to take this tour with Ryan! Would definitely recommend 10/10!! Mahalo!
